name.baseName: Aluminum electrolysis ; Liquid primary aluminum ; Prebaking ; Alumina for metallurgy ; 2014
铝电解 ; 液态原铝 ; 预焙 ; 冶金用氧化铝 ; 2014年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The given data set predominantly describes the process of aluminum electrolysis, which is focused on producing liquid primary aluminum using a prebaking approach from metallurgical alumina in the year 2014. This process is integral in the aluminum production industry and serves as a foundation for the manufacture of various aluminum-based products. The liquid primary aluminum obtained is crucial for producing components utilized across automotive, aerospace, construction, packaging, and electrical sectors due to its lightweight and corrosion resistance properties.
该数据集主要描述2014年使用预焙方法从冶金用氧化铝生产液态原铝的铝电解过程。该过程是铝生产工业的一个组成部分，并为制造各种基于铝的产品提供基础。所获得的液态原铝对于生产汽车、航空航天、建筑、包装和电器行业中使用的轻质、耐腐蚀的组件至关重要。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The given data set predominantly describes the process of aluminum electrolysis, which is focused on producing liquid primary aluminum using a prebaking approach from metallurgical alumina in the year 2014. This process is integral in the aluminum production industry and serves as a foundation for the manufacture of various aluminum-based products. The liquid primary aluminum obtained is crucial for producing components utilized across automotive, aerospace, construction, packaging, and electrical sectors due to its lightweight and corrosion resistance properties.
该数据集主要描述2014年使用预焙方法从冶金用氧化铝生产液态原铝的铝电解过程。该过程是铝生产工业的一个组成部分，并为制造各种基于铝的产品提供基础。所获得的液态原铝对于生产汽车、航空航天、建筑、包装和电器行业中使用的轻质、耐腐蚀的组件至关重要。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: For accurate Life Cycle Assessment of aluminum production using this data set, users should ensure the contextual relevance of the 2014 data to their respective assessment year since technological advancements and efficiency improvements may alter subsequent process outputs. It is important to note that the PA (Primary Aluminum) data is based on statistical sources, while the SA (Secondary Aluminum) data is derived from literature. External LCA practitioners should cross-reference their data with updated databases, keeping in mind the technological applicability fits the locale-specific industry practices. Recycling should be considered where applicable, and background data from the CAS RCEES 2018 database should be used with acknowledgement of its geospatial and temporal context.

用户在使用该数据集进行铝生产的生命周期评估时，应确保2014年的数据与其评估年份的情境相关性，因为技术进步和效率提高可能会改变随后的过程输出。值得注意的是，PA（原铝）数据基于统计来源，而SA（再生铝）数据主要基于文献。外部LCA从业者应当与更新的数据库进行交叉参考，同时注意技术适用性应符合当地特定行业实践。在适用的情况下应考虑回收，并应将CAS RCEES 2018数据库的背景数据与其地理和时间背景联系起来使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
